name: friendsofcake/cakepdf
description: CakePHP plugin for creating and/or rendering Pdfs, several Pdf engines supported.

suggest.dompdf/dompdf: If you wish to use the DomPdf engine
suggest.tecnick.com/tcpdf: If you wish to use the Tcpdf engine
suggest.mpdf/mpdf: If you wish to use the Mpdf engine
